content: knit bills she enjoys seeing fields of sheep on her drive to and from row 78-84 k1 p1 repeat until end of round work bind off all stitches loosely visit the blog at http //www twistedloops com thumb mistakes questions email place the 16 stitches on the holder or waste yarn onto twistedloops@gmail com the needles and join for working in the round ravelry id twistedloops row 1-2 knit row 3-4 purl this pattern is intended for private use only the pattern photos and row 5 knit products made from the pattern may not be used for commercial purposes with out the written consent of the designer row 6-9 k1 p1 repeat until end of round bind off all stitches loosely weave in ends cancans copyright © 2009 erica lomax for twisted loops designs all rights reserved http //www twistedloops com
